solo.title: Solo Plan (BYOK)
solo.description: You're using your own API keys. No usage tracking or billing through Imlil.dev.

usage.title: Usage Dashboard
usage.description: Track your EmbedAPI Pro plan usage and costs

payment.title: Add Credits
payment.description: Manage your billing and add credits through the EmbedAPI website. The API will return an error when credits are consumed.
payment.websiteNote: All payments and billing management are handled on the EmbedAPI website. Click below to open the billing page.
payment.errorNote: Note: If you run out of credits, the API will return an error. Add credits on the website to continue using the service.
